comment.author: 32605636@N06
comment._content: Gustav Alfonso and Theophile Mary (nee Schulz) Steindl were Austrian by birth and arrived in Australia in 1872. They had twelve children. Fanny, Otto Richard (Tony), Annie Matilda, Julian Mieczslaw (Disha), Sophie Josephine and Jessie. Alexandra Theodora (Lilla), Florence Clare (Florrie), father Gustav Alfonso, Gustav Alfred (seated in front), Grace Vivienne, mother Theophile Mary, Eunice Olive Constance (Connie) and Mabel Marie.
